abstract: Stock market rises on merger news and upbeat economic report; Nasdaq climbs 44 points to 5,008.
lead_paragraph: The market headed higher on encouraging deals and economic news. The tech-heavy Nasdaq rose 44 points to 5,008.

headline.main: Nasdaq Tops 5,000 for the First Time in 15 Years

snippet: The market headed higher on encouraging deals and economic news. The tech-heavy Nasdaq rose 44 points to 5,008.
